br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.rpg

Class RpgRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.renderers.BatchTiledMapRenderer
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.rpg.RpgRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapRenderer, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapRenderer, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class RpgRenderer
extends com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.renderers.BatchTiledMapRenderer
    This class is a more robust substitute for OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer , including a sprite batch previously created (instead of having to instantiate its own) and rendering the objects of the current layer (including the player character) as well;
